Episodes.Title: Laundry Woes
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Hilary Florido, Madeline Queripel
Episodes.Actors: J.G. Quintel, William Salyers, Sam Marin
Episodes.Plot: Mordecai, still in a state of depression from Margaret's rejection at the Stake Me Amadeus restaurant, ends up finding her sweater in the laundry and plans to give it back to her at her college.

Episodes.Title: Silver Dude
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Sarah Oleksyk, Owen Dennis
Episodes.Actors: J.G. Quintel, William Salyers, John Cygan
Episodes.Plot: Mordecai and Rigby decide to create songs and sing them to people in the park so they can raise money to buy a special video game, but they run into a silver street performer who is stealing their songs and dancing to them.

Episodes.Title: Benson's Car
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Calvin Wong, Minty Lewis
Episodes.Actors: J.G. Quintel, William Salyers, Sam Marin
Episodes.Plot: Mordecai and Rigby have to fix Benson's car when they accidentally throw the T.V. remote into the windshield.

Episodes.Title: Every Meat Burritos
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Sarah Oleksyk, Owen Dennis
Episodes.Actors: J.G. Quintel, William Salyers, Lex Lang
Episodes.Plot: Mordecai, Rigby, Muscleman, and High-Five Ghost want to eat an Every Meat burrito, but the restaurant won't let them buy any until they have an actual car to use in the drive-through.

Episodes.Title: Wall Buddy
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Calvin Wong, Minty Lewis
Episodes.Actors: J.G. Quintel, William Salyers, Mark Hamill
Episodes.Plot: When Benson tells Mordecai and Rigby to clean their room, Rigby buys a special room-separating system so he doesn't have to clean the mess.

Episodes.Title: A Skips in Time
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Calvin Wong, Toby Jones
Episodes.Actors: J.G. Quintel, William Salyers, Steve Blum
Episodes.Plot: When Teenage Skips is accidentally sent into the future while storm-chasing, Mordecai and Rigby have to help him return to the 1700s.

Episodes.Title: Survival Skills
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Minty Lewis, Matt Price
Episodes.Actors: Mark Hamill, Sam Marin, J.G. Quintel
Episodes.Plot: Mordecai and Rigby have to buy tortillas for Benson's survival seminar, but they get lost in the woods on the way back to the site.

Episodes.Title: Terror Tales of the Park III
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Calvin Wong, Toby Jones
Episodes.Actors: Mark Hamill, Yuri Lowenthal, Sam Marin
Episodes.Plot: Each of the park guys want to win a bet by telling the scariest story at a Halloween party.

Episodes.Title: Tants
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Hilary Florido, Madeline Queripel
Episodes.Actors: Minty Lewis, Sam Marin, J.G. Quintel
Episodes.Plot: When Pops gives Tants, the table-pants, to Mordecai an Rigby as a gift, they accidentally ruin them and have to get new ones before their "Tants-Lunch" with Pops the next day.

Episodes.Title: Bank Shot
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Sarah Oleksyk, Owen Dennis
Episodes.Actors: Steve Blum, Mark Hamill, Phil LaMarr
Episodes.Plot: Rigby tries to win a dire bet by beating a guy at "Bank Shot", an arcade game that requires skilled and intricate basket ball bank shots.

Episodes.Title: Power Tower
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Benton Connor, Andres Salaff
Episodes.Actors: J.G. Quintel, William Salyers, Sam Marin
Episodes.Plot: When Muscle Man is banned from a gym, he tries to win a weight-lifting contest to gain entrance again. But, first he must get his muscles back.

Episodes.Title: The Thanksgiving Special
Episodes.Director: J.G. Quintel, Mike Roth, John Davis Infantino
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Calvin Wong, Toby Jones
Episodes.Actors: J.G. Quintel, William Salyers, Sam Marin
Episodes.Plot: Mordecai and Rigby accidentally ruin Thanksgiving and must find a way to save it before their families arrive for dinner.

Episodes.Title: The Heart of a Stuntmen
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Calvin Wong, Minty Lewis
Episodes.Actors: Bobcat Goldthwait, Sam Marin, J.G. Quintel
Episodes.Plot: Mordecai, Rigby, High-Five Ghost and Muscleman have to get a stuntman license, so they can perform at a little kids birthday, when the original stuntman cops-out at the last minute.

Episodes.Title: New Year's Kiss
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Hilary Florido, Madeline Queripel
Episodes.Actors: J.G. Quintel, William Salyers, Linda Cardellini
Episodes.Plot: A Rigby that appears to be from the future, tells past-Rigby that he must stop Mordecai from kissing a girl on New Year's Eve.

Episodes.Title: Dodge This
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Benton Connor, Andres Salaff
Episodes.Actors: J.G. Quintel, William Salyers, Linda Cardellini
Episodes.Plot: The gang wants to win a dodge ball tournament, but Mordecai notices that CJ, the girl he kissed accidentally on New Year's Eve, is on a team competing in the tournament.

Episodes.Title: Portable Toilet
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Toby Jones, Owen Dennis
Episodes.Actors: Linda Cardellini, Mark Deklin, Rhomeyn Johnson
Episodes.Plot: When C.J. dares Mordecai to eat a sandwich inside a portable toilet, Rigby goes with him and ends up getting the door jammed shut with meatball-gravy.

Episodes.Title: The Postcard
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Hilary Florido, Madeline Queripel
Episodes.Actors: Steve Blum, Zosia Mamet, Sam Marin
Episodes.Plot: High-Five Ghost gets the help of the guys to remember where he was supposed to reunite with a girl from his past when he receives a "special" postcard from her.

Episodes.Title: Rigby in the Sky with Burrito
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Hilary Florido, Madeline Queripel
Episodes.Actors: Steve Blum, Sam Marin, J.G. Quintel
Episodes.Plot: When Rigby receives an invitation to his high-school reunion, he realizes that he hasn't accomplished anything that he claimed he would do. So, with little time he tries to achieve one thing, skydiving while eating a burrito.

Episodes.Title: Journey to the Bottom of the Crash Pit
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Benton Connor, Sarah Oleksyk
Episodes.Actors: Mark Hamill, Sam Marin, J.G. Quintel
Episodes.Plot: When Benson tells the guys that they have to fill up the crash pit, they try to have one last crash caught on tape. But, when they execute the crash, they realize that the video-camera went down with the car and have to get it back.

Episodes.Title: Saving Time
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Andres Salaff, Ryan Pequin
Episodes.Actors: J.G. Quintel, William Salyers, Sam Marin
Episodes.Plot: Mordecai and Rigby have to change the clocks in the park for Daylight Savings Time. But they decide to prank Benson with it by changing the clocks to the wrong time.

Episodes.Title: Guitar of Rock
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Andres Salaff, Ryan Pequin
Episodes.Actors: J.G. Quintel, William Salyers, Sam Marin
Episodes.Plot: When Benson breaks Mr. Mallard's special guitar, him, Mordecai and Rigby have to get a new one signed.

Episodes.Title: Skips' Story
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Calvin Wong, Minty Lewis
Episodes.Actors: Troy Baker, Robin Atkin Downes, Grey Griffin
Episodes.Plot: While on break Skips tells Mordecai and Rigby the story and the truth about how he became immortal.

Episodes.Title: Return of Mordecai and the Rigbys
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Calvin Wong, Minty Lewis
Episodes.Actors: Mark Hamill, Phil LaMarr, Minty Lewis
Episodes.Plot: Mordecai and Rigby, tired of the heat, decide to bring back their band "Mordecai and the Rigbys" so they can enter in a battle of the bands and win an air conditioner.

Episodes.Title: Bad Portrait
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Toby Jones, Owen Dennis
Episodes.Actors: Chris Cox, Mark Hamill, Sam Marin
Episodes.Plot: Pops' asks Mordecai and Rigby to pick up a portrait of Benson for his ceremony. But when Rigby ruins it, Mordecai is forced to re-paint it.

Episodes.Title: Video 101
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Benton Connor, Sarah Oleksyk
Episodes.Actors: Linda Cardellini, Minty Lewis, J.G. Quintel
Episodes.Plot: Mordecai, Rigby and CJ help Eileen with a music video as a final project for her film-making class.

Episodes.Title: I Like You Hi
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Toby Jones, Owen Dennis
Episodes.Actors: Linda Cardellini, Rich Fulcher, Mark Hamill
Episodes.Plot: Mordecai tries to explain to C.J. that his auto-corrected text "I Like You Hi" was meant to read, "I like Yuji".

Episodes.Title: Play Date
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Hilary Florido, Madeline Queripel
Episodes.Actors: J.G. Quintel, William Salyers, Linda Cardellini
Episodes.Plot: When Mordecai plans to go on a date with CJ, Death pops up and tells him he has to watch Thomas again.

Episodes.Title: Expert or Liar
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Benton Connor, Sarah Oleksyk
Episodes.Actors: Troy Baker, Mark Hamill, Sam Marin
Episodes.Plot: When Rigby is exposed on a surprise television game show for lying, he tries to find the lead host of the show to redeem himself.

Episodes.Title: Gold Watch
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Andres Salaff, Ryan Pequin
Episodes.Actors: John Cygan, Mark Hamill, Sam Marin
Episodes.Plot: The night before Benson is supposed to be awarded a gold watch for being on-time for work 1000 consecutive days in-a-row, he meets a pair of test pilots at Wing Kingdom and ends up waking up the next morning in the middle of nowhere.

Episodes.Title: Catching the Wave
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Calvin Wong, Minty Lewis
Episodes.Actors: Troy Baker, John Cygan, Mark Hamill
Episodes.Plot: Pops wants to learn how to surf so he can become "one" with nature.

Episodes.Title: Paint Job
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Toby Jones, Owen Dennis
Episodes.Actors: Troy Baker, Steve Blum, Linda Cardellini
Episodes.Plot: When Mordecai and Rigby strip the paint off of the house with the power washer, they have to re-paint the house by the end of the weekend.

Episodes.Title: Take the Cake
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Hilary Florido, Madeline Queripel
Episodes.Actors: Linda Cardellini, Mark Hamill, Minty Lewis
Episodes.Plot: Mordecai and Rigby have to pick up a cake for Mr. Maellard's surprise birthday party.

Episodes.Title: Skips in the Saddle
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Benton Connor, Sarah Oleksyk
Episodes.Actors: Laura Bailey, Steve Blum, John Cygan
Episodes.Plot: When Skips realizes that he is starting to become lonely, he starts to date again, but inadvertently becomes a contestant on a date-game show when Mordecai and Rigby make him an impressive but fake dating profile on a website.

Episodes.Title: Thomas Fights Back
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Andres Salaff, Ryan Pequin
Episodes.Actors: Mark Hamill, Sam Marin, J.G. Quintel
Episodes.Plot: When Thomas finds out that Benson is going to fire him, he tries to prove to Benson that he is useful by creating and executing a plan to get back the park's stolen statue.

Episodes.Title: Bachelor Party! Zingo!
Episodes.Writer: Toby Jones, Owen Dennis, J.G. Quintel
Episodes.Actors: Mark Hamill, Sam Marin, Matt Price
Episodes.Plot: When Quips comes to town for his bachelor party, Skips, the best man, is given the task of getting chicken wings.

Episodes.Title: Tent Trouble
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Hilary Florido, Madeline Queripel
Episodes.Actors: Linda Cardellini, John Cygan, Mark Hamill
Episodes.Plot: When Mordecai and Rigby ruin CJ's luxury camping tent, they have to get part-time jobs to raise enough money to buy another one before the camping trip.

Episodes.Title: Real Date
Episodes.Writer: J.G. Quintel, Calvin Wong, Minty Lewis
Episodes.Actors: J.G. Quintel, William Salyers, Sam Marin
Episodes.Plot: When Mordecai and CJ realize that they have never been on a romantic date, they schedule one. But, their special gifts that they have secretly planned for the other one coincide and create problems for each other.
